issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The described issue is not actually a problem - it is as designed.
resolution.name: Not A Problem

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

comments.body: YARN-2460 tried to remove the configuration but kept it as it was because for future use case. {{yarn.timeline-service.hostname}} cannot be configured even now and other configurations such as {{yarn.timeline-service.address}} that seemed to depend on {{yarn.timeline-service.hostname}} does not use {{yarn.timeline-service.hostname}}. So we can change the documentation as well to reflect actual implementation.

This message was automatically generated.
yarn.timeline-service.hostname is a temp property that is used for other ATS configs. This bug is invalid. Sorry for the confusion.
